query: Create a new agent called 'code-reviewer' that performs automated code reviews with a focus on security
expected_behavior: Agent auto-invokes agent-conventions skill when creating a new agent definition
Agent validates the name 'code-reviewer' as kebab-case matching the pattern ^[a-z0-9][a-z0-9-]*$
Agent creates agents/code-reviewer.md with required frontmatter fields: name (matching filename) and description (non-empty)
Agent writes the system prompt body in imperative voice ('Check the logs' not 'Checks the logs')
Agent updates the corresponding README.md index with a new row for code-reviewer sorted alphabetically
Agent runs 'wagents validate' after creating the agent to check frontmatter compliance
